> Megs was weak then he would challenge and if Megs was strong then
> Megs wouldn't have a challenge.  UltraByte entered the Bridge or the
> remains of the Bridge.
>

{Nightshade}

    Nightshade leaned against a console watching the confrontation as more
and more of the rag tag band showed up on the bridge, this latest specimen
seemed to hold that same thoughful gaze Megatron had. She didn't lust for
power as openly as these fools, such positions came with considerable
risks....from "lackeys" such these and herself. Giving a small chuckle she
watched Ultabyte watch their leaders conflict.

    "Get in line da'ling," She drawled, as she stretched her lith robotic
form, "Seems ta be quite a line to question our leader..." Idly she toyed
with the console that she sat on, dragging her thin fingers over the buttons
and noting the stations use. Already lines in the sand were being drawn and
it would be a good idea to choose the right side from the get go...But first
she'd let this little drama play out a little longer and see who was worth
it.
